title: The Busy Bee and the Forgetful Ant
hook: What happens when a busy bee and a forgetful ant meet in the middle of a blooming meadow?
moral: Being helpful and understanding can lead to unexpected friendships and happy endings.
paragraphs: Once upon a time, in a lush meadow filled with colorful flowers and buzzing bees, there lived a busy bee named Buzz and a forgetful ant named Andy.
One sunny day, while Buzz was collecting nectar for the hive, he spotted Andy struggling with carrying food to his anthill.
"Hello there! It looks like you could use some help," Buzz buzzed cheerfully.
"Oh, thank you, kind bee! I keep forgetting where I left the food," Andy replied with a smile.
Buzz decided to lend a helping wing to Andy by guiding him to his lost food trail. Together, they found the missing food and brought it safely to the anthill.
From that day on, Buzz and Andy became the best of friends, always helping each other in times of need.

en-fr.title: La Abeille Occupée et la Fourmi Distraite
en-fr.hook: Que se passe-t-il lorsque une abeille occupée et une fourmi étourdie se rencontrent au milieu d'une prairie fleurie?
en-fr.moral: Etre gentil et comprendre peut amener à des amitiés inattendues et à des fins joyeuses.
paragraphs:
Il était une fois, dans une prairie luxuriante remplie de fleurs colorées et d'abeilles bourdonnantes, vivait une abeille occupée nommée Buzz et une fourmi distrait nommée Andy.
Il était une fois, un jour ensoleillé, Buzz collectait du nectar pour la ruche quand il a vu Andy avoir du mal à porter de la nourriture vers sa fourmilière.
"Bonjour ! On dirait que tu pourrais utiliser de l'aide," bourdonna Buzz joyeusement.
Oh, merci, gentille abeille ! J'oublie toujours où j'ai laissé la nourriture, dit Andy avec un sourire.
Buzz a décidé d'aider Andy en le guidant vers sa trace de nourriture perdue. Ensemble, ils ont trouvé la nourriture manquante et l'ont ramenée en sécurité à la fourmilière.
Depuis ce jour-là, Buzz et Andy sont devenus les meilleurs amis, toujours en train de s'aider l'un l'autre quand ils ont besoin.

en-pt.title: A Abelhinha Ocupada e a Formiguinha Esquecida
en-pt.hook: O que acontece quando uma abelha ocupada e uma formiga esquecida se encontram no meio de um prado florido?
en-pt.moral: Ser prestativo e atencioso pode levar a amizades inesperadas e finais felizes.
paragraphs:
Era uma vez, em um campo verde cheio de flores coloridas e abelhas zumbindo, vivia uma abelha atarefada chamada Zumbido e uma formiga esquecida chamada Andy.
Num dia ensolarado, enquanto Buzz estava coletando néctar para a colmeia, ele viu Andy tendo dificuldades para carregar comida para o formigueiro.
Olá! Parece que você precisa de ajuda," Zumbido zumbiu alegremente.
"Ah, obrigado, abelhinha gentil! Eu sempre esqueço onde deixei a comida," Andy respondeu com um sorriso.
Zumbido decidiu ajudar o Andy guiando-o até o caminho onde ele perdeu sua comida. Juntos, encontraram a comida perdida e a levaram com segurança para o formigueiro.
A partir daquele dia, Buzz e Andy se tornaram os melhores amigos, sempre se ajudando nos momentos difíceis.

id-en.hook: What happens when a busy bee and a forgetful ant meet in the middle of a blooming meadow?
id-en.moral: Being helpful and understanding can lead to unexpected friendships and happy endings.
id-en.title: The Busy Bee and the Forgetful Ant
paragraphs:
Long time ago, in a green field with many pretty flowers and noisy flying insects, there was a hardworking bee called Buzz and a little forgetful insect called Andy.
One day with lots of sunshine, Buzz saw Andy having a hard time bringing food to his anthill while Buzz was collecting sweet flower juice for the bee house.
"Hi! It seems like you need some help," Buzz happily buzzed.
"Oh, thank you, kind bee! I keep forgetting where I left the food," Andy replied with a smile.
Buzz helped Andy find his lost food trail. They found the missing food and took it back to the anthill.
After that day, Buzz and Andy were best friends. They always helped each other when they needed help.

en-de.title: Die fleißige Biene und die vergeßliche Ameise
en-de.moral: Wenn du hilfsbereit und verständnisvoll bist, kannst du unerwartete Freundschaften schließen und glückliche Enden erleben.
en-de.hook: Was passiert wenn eine fleißige Biene und eine vergessliche Ameise sich in der Mitte einer blühenden Wiese treffen?
paragraphs:
Es war einmal, in einer grünen Wiese voller bunter Blumen und summender Bienen, lebte eine fleißige Biene namens Buzz und eine vergessliche Ameise namens Andy.
An einem sonnigen Tag, als Buzz Nektar für den Bienenstock sammelte, sah er Andy kämpfen, um Nahrung zu seinem Ameisenhügel zu tragen.
"Hallo! Es sieht aus, als ob du etwas Hilfe gebrauchen könntest", summte Summsumm fröhlich.
"Oh, danke, liebe Biene! Ich vergesse immer, wo ich das Essen gelassen habe", antwortete Andy mit einem Lächeln.
Buzz entschied sich, Andy zu helfen, indem er ihm half, seine verlorene Futterstelle zu finden. Zusammen fanden sie das fehlende Futter und brachten es sicher zum Ameisenhaufen.
Seit diesem Tag waren Buzz und Andy die besten Freunde, die einander immer in Notzeiten halfen.
